about.description1: Hi! I'm Max and I love transforming complex problems into elegant digital solutions.
about.description2: In my daily work as a fullstack developer, I bring frontend and backend together – from Angular interfaces to robust Java Spring applications.
about.description3: What drives me? The passion for clean, maintainable code and the joy of bringing ideas to life.
about.description4: When I'm not coding, I experiment with new technologies or share my knowledge with the developer community.
